name: OneShotRogueDemo
description:
"OneShotRogue" is a deck-building roguelike.

Use cards so that the enemy's hp is just 0.

All battles are

Player's turn -> Enemy's turn -> End of battle.

So it is a very simple battle as it takes only one turn.

Aim for the deepest level of the dungeon by making full use of cards and items.

Main Elements

More than 200 types of cards

More than 100 types of enemies

Items, Relics, etc.

Video Posting and Live Broadcast

Posting of videos and live broadcasts of introductions, play-by-play, commentary, etc. using game footage is permitted, regardless of whether they are personal or corporate, for-profit or non-profit.

Please include the URL of "OneShot Rogue" on Steam in the summary section when posting or distributing your video.

Some cards and enemies do not appear, and some items and relics have changed effects in the Demo version.

Donations would be greatly appreciated!
